name: opentakeoff
description: Self-hostable web application for construction/electrical plan take-offs

scripts.docker:test:build: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml --profile local-test build
scripts.docker:test:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml --profile local-test up -d
scripts.docker:test:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml --profile local-test down && rm -rf ./.tmp/local-test
scripts.docker:test:logs: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml --profile local-test logs -f
scripts.docker:test:full: pnpm run docker:test:down && pnpm run docker:test:build && pnpm run docker:test:up && pnpm run docker:test:logs
